Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have been having texture issues ever since I can remember updating. I am running KSP on Mac OS X 10.10.3 and KSP v1.0.4. I will list all of the mods I have installed but none of them are graphic mods and my KSP is near stock at the moment.

- MechJeb

- HyperEdit

- SpaceY Lifters

- HullCameraVDS

- NearFutureSolar

I do not believe it is a mod that is causing this, however at the moment, I have not yet gone through mod-by-mod and tried troubleshooting like that. Any help would be much appreciated and if you would like more info, just ask. Thank you!

More info is definitely required, what are these glitches? Post pics to imgur.com for us please.

Also see the stickied support thread for info on the log files we need, including your system specs.
